TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Balung, title = Balung, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Balung} }

S.FORM: Balung Itiniay i Fuxing Cen no Taoyuan ko Balung a niyaro', 82 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 225 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 73% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 165 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 27% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 60 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 70%, Amis 1%, Truku 0.4%, roma 1%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.

Balong Itiniay i Foxing Cen no Taoyoan ko Balong a niyaro', 82 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 225 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 73% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 165 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 27% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 60 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 70%, Amis 1%, Troko 0.4%, roma 1%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.
